page.title: 08Westering Primary School
page.content: Westering County Primary is what we call an open-plan school. There are no walls in our school and all the classes are positioned on three sides of a large rectangle with the kitchen, dining room and halls on the fourth long side. If you stand in the north west corner of the school you can see six classes one way and four classes the other way. The whole school is very bright and cheerful looking, with attractive display boards, large areas of carpet, wet areas, quiet bays for reading, an audio visual aids room for watching the television or films, a music room where we can sing and play musical instruments, library areas and two halls where we do gymnastics and indoor games. New children say they find it very strange at first but soon find out how friendly and interesting it is and then they like it very much.
